alert.note: Alert for Clay; Montgomery; Parke; Putnam; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:27PM EDT until March 31 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Vigo County in west central Indiana... Northern Clay County in west central Indiana... Parke County in west central Indiana... Southern Vermillion County in west central Indiana... Western Putnam County in west central Indiana... Southwestern Montgomery County in west central Indiana... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1027 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located over mainly rural areas of Vermillion county , moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Terre Haute, Crawfordsville, Brazil, Clinton, Rockville, Newport, West Terre Haute, Fairview Park, Prairieton, Seelyville, Montezuma, Knightsville, Rosedale, Harmony, New Market, Dana, Staunton, Waveland, Carbon and Universal. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 1 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for west central Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Montgomery; Parke; Putnam; Vermillion; Vigo
